mapper.select: select id, activity_content_id, user_id, create_time, file_path from `activity_content_record`

SELECT acr.id as aid, acr.user_id, acr.create_time, ac.id, ac.title FROM `activity_content_record` acr left join `activity_content` ac on acr.activity_content_id = ac.id where ac.activity_id = #{activityId} order by acr.create_time desc
